long_description: Whoa nelly what a wild ride! You are now floating in the Space Near the Escape Pod. Sorry, just go with it, I can’t always come up with the most fun names, but hey, its descriptive isn’t it? From here you can see the Escape Pod, positioned at the far west end of the ship. As you maneuver your way toward the pod you notice a series of clamp-like objects positioned between the Pod and the main ship. Hm, you may want to check into those a little more closely! You look back to see the expanse of space between you and the Space Near EVA Chamber.
short_description: You are back in the Space Near the Escape Pod. You can see the Escape Pod jutting out from the ship below you. From here you see that you can move back towards the Space Near EVA Chamber.

inventory_list.name: plant
inventory_list.use_desc: You talk to the plant and wonder if you can sneak it past customs back on Earth

inventory_list.description: this is the key to the pod
inventory_list.name: key
inventory_list.use_desc: Turning the key in the ignition of the pod you feel the engine beginning to hum to life.

feature1_keywords.door: You open the door to reveal a bulkhead... Perhaps it is an aesthetics thing like women's pockets?
feature1_keywords.desk: Opening the desk reveals nothing of note.
